alert.note: Alert for Eastern Tucker (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 05 at 2:23PM EST until January 06 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 10 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Brief period of freezing rain possible. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 7 inches and ice accumulations around a light glaze. * WHERE...Eastern Tucker County. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 10 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Please report snow or ice accumulations by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPittsburgh.
